content: User to whom the data will be transferred

comment.text: "This translation key is used to display a label explaining who the data will be transferred to. It appears in a dialog component, specifically in the 'New Owner' section, and is intended to inform users about the data transfer process."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation conveys the general meaning, "Məlumatların ötürüləcəyi istifadəçi" is somewhat literal and could be improved for naturalness. A more idiomatic translation would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Məlumat ötürülən istifadəçi" or "Data ötürülən istifadəçi".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Օգտատեր, ում տվյալները կփոխանցվեն" is overly literal and sounds unnatural in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'Recipient user' or 'User receiving the data'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Ստացող օգտատեր" (Stacogh ogtater - Recipient user) or "Օգտատեր, ում վրա կփոխանցվեն տվյալները" (Ogtater, um vra k’poxantvnen tvyalner - User to whom the data will be transferred - a less literal but more fluent option).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "データの転送先ユーザー" is a literal translation and while understandable, it's not the most natural way to express "User to whom the data will be transferred" in Japanese. It sounds a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "データ転送先ユーザー" (Data transfer destination user), or a more descriptive phrase depending on the context, such as "データを受け取るユーザー" (User who will receive the data).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "데이터를 이전 받을 사용자" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "User to whom the data will be transferred." While technically correct, it sounds a bit formal and literal. A more natural translation would be something like "데이터를 받을 사용자" or "데이터를 양도받을 사용자".
The Lao translation 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ຂໍ້ມູນຈະຖືກໂອນ' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Lao. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜູ້ຮັບຂໍ້ມູນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Utilizatorul căruia îi vor transfera datele' is not the most natural or precise translation of 'User to whom the data will be transferred'. It sounds somewhat awkward in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Utilizatorul către care vor fi transferate datele' or 'Utilizatorul cu care se vor transfera datele'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizatorul către care vor fi transferate datele

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයාගෙන් දත්ත ලබන්නා' is not an accurate translation of 'User to whom the data will be transferred'. It literally translates to 'Person receiving data from the user'. It doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'to whom the data will be transferred'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like 'කවර පුද්ගලයෙකුට දත්ත हस्तांतरණය කරන්නේ' (kavara puggalaayakama dath hadantheranaya karane) or 'දත්ත हस्तांतरණය වන පුද්ගලයෙකු' (dath hadantheranaya vanaya puggalaayakama).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Používateľ, ktorému sa údaje prenesú' is grammatically correct but lacks the clarity of the original English phrase. A more accurate translation would emphasize 'the user'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Používateľ, na ktorého sa údaje prenesú

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'prenesú' which implies a one-time transfer. Depending on the context, 'prebieha prenos údajov' or 'na ktorého sa údaje prenášajú' might be more suitable to indicate ongoing or potential future transfers.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Používateľ, na ktorého sa údaje prenášajú

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Корисник којем ће подаци бити пребачени' is a bit clunky and formal. A more natural and commonly used translation would be more concise.
The translation "数据传输对象用户" is not the most natural or accurate rendering of "User to whom the data will be transferred." While technically correct, it's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "数据接收用户" (Data receiving user) or "数据转交用户" (User to whom the data is transferred).  "数据转交对象" (Data transfer object) is another possibility.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a somewhat formal tone.  Depending on the application, a slightly less formal tone might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Re-evaluate the desired tone and adjust the translation accordingly.
